trans-unit.source: Defines the metadata attribute that ASP.NET server controls use to specify whether they participate in loading view-state information by <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID*>.
trans-unit.target: 定义的元数据特性 ASP.NET 服务器控件用于指定是否参与由<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID*>.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID*>加载视图状态信息

trans-unit.source: The ViewStateModeByIdAttribute class is used to specify a control that requires view-state loading by <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>.
trans-unit.target: ViewStateModeByIdAttribute 类用于指定的控件要求视图状态加载<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default view-state loading behavior is for ASP.NET to load the view-state information for a control by its index in the control tree of the page.
trans-unit.target: 默认视图状态加载行为是 asp.net 按其索引页的管理树中加载的控件的视图状态信息。

trans-unit.source: There is a performance cost for loading view-state information by <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> because the page control tree must be searched for the control specifically before loading its view-state information.
trans-unit.target: 用于加载视图状态信息的性能开销<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>因为加载其视图状态信息之前，具体而言，必须进行页控件树搜索控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the ViewStateModeByIdAttribute class is used as a metadata attribute of a custom control class, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.LoadViewStateByID%2A> property of the control returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果 ViewStateModeByIdAttribute 类用作自定义控件类的元数据属性<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.LoadViewStateByID%2A>的控件的属性返回`true`。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.LoadViewStateByID%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the ViewStateModeByIdAttribute class is not used, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.LoadViewStateByID%2A> property of the control returns its default value of `false`, which means that the control does not load its view-state information by <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果未使用 ViewStateModeByIdAttribute 类，<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.LoadViewStateByID%2A>的控件的属性返回其默认值为`false`，这意味着控件不会由<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>加载其视图状态信息</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.LoadViewStateByID%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关使用属性的详细信息，请参阅[属性](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The ViewStateModeByIdAttribute class does not apply to saving the view-state information for a control.
trans-unit.target: ViewStateModeByIdAttribute 类不适用于保存控件的视图状态信息。

trans-unit.source: The ViewStateModeByIdAttribute class metadata attribute is valid only on class declarations.
trans-unit.target: ViewStateModeByIdAttribute 类元数据特性是仅在类声明中有效。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ViewStateModeByIdAttribute"></xref> class.
Applying the <xref:System.Web.UI.ViewStateModeByIdAttribute> to a control class means that the control will have its view-state information loaded by <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 应用<xref:System.Web.UI.ViewStateModeByIdAttribute>对控件类意味着控件将具有由<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>加载其视图状态信息</xref:System.Web.UI.ViewStateModeByIdAttribute>
